Reviews.Title: Good and Tuff! But waterproof unknown..
Reviews.Author: klmhav
Reviews.Content: Genuine Motorola Like they were before google owned there phone division. User friendly. I don't know why they stopped making them.. Oh yea google came along

Reviews.Title: Not the greatest phone !!
Reviews.Author: Sparkle
Reviews.Content: I really like Motorola products. This particular flip sometimes works when it wants too !!! I thought it was new when I purchased, but it seems like it was refurbished.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: This is the second phone I have ordered before Motorola discontinued the product line.  I have dropped it off roofs, into water, drove over it and keeps going!  (This was for my father since mine has been the same for 4 years)

Reviews.Title: Great Simple Phone
Reviews.Author: Steve Kramer
Reviews.Content: Great Simple phone for my dad.  NO MORE BUTT CALLING!!!  Besides that if he falls asleep and his phone falls in his coffee, he's safe.

Reviews.Title: Best phone I've ever owned!
Reviews.Author: BT
Reviews.Content: Had one for several years and finally had to replace it. Rugged, durable, and most of all, it keeps and makes calls in marginal areas where calls get lost by most other phones with the same provider. Not a smart phone but smarter than your average basic phone and I LOSE LESS CALLS!!!

Reviews.Title: This is a great dumb phone.
Reviews.Author: william p ewan jr
Reviews.Content: I dont realy need a smart phone for I use my computer on a regular bases. Lost my 1st 860 and loved it so I bought another 860. My old 860 was found and now I have a backup. This is a great phone if you want to stay dumb and save on your cell phone bill.

Reviews.Title: One tough phone!
Reviews.Author: DW
Reviews.Content: I bought this one to replace my damaged Barrage, which was the only cell phone that came close to surviving the torture I put it through! The Barrage is very rugged and compact and meets my needs for critical communications in emergency situations.

Reviews.Title: We love this phone. Great and durable
Reviews.Author: Betty J. Macknight
Reviews.Content: We have a farm and to say everything gets a little abuse is an understatement.  Riding tractors, etc.  Dropping the phone etc.  But this model is the real deal.  My husband doesn't like a phone but he loves this one.. What a deal.  Good seller too..

Reviews.Title: Motorola Barrage V860
Reviews.Author: Leonard
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone. I used one like this one for a few years.It meets all my needs. Just not to change to smart phone yet,

Reviews.Title: Dirty and lots of scratches.
Reviews.Author: Katarina S. Phelps
Reviews.Content: Was dirty (yucky!) and with a lot of scratches. Just decided to keep it because I didn't wanted to go through the hassle of returning it. I guess you get what you pay for! . I will rather to keep my older one that has a broken screen, but at least is way cleaner.

Reviews.Title: I'm totally satisfied again!
Reviews.Author: dakota searcher
Reviews.Content: I choose a 5 star rating because the product met my expectations at a very reasonable price. I love shopping this way!

Reviews.Title: just like original
Reviews.Author: clayton thompson
Reviews.Content: it works just like my original. I got it so I would not have to renew my contract with Verizon till I am ready.

Reviews.Title: Great for what I want
Reviews.Author: TripleCrownJim
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I wanted to do make mandatory restatement about how an item is, ok it is what I want and does fine

Reviews.Title: Did not work.
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: When i bought this cell phone from this company the battery had a full charge. By the time the battery died and i plugged it in to charge it that is when i found out the charging port did not work making the cell phone useless. I have tried other batteries and chargers, it is the phone port itself that didnt work., Dont buy from this company unless you want to get a product that works just long enough for the warrenty to run out. The cell phone itself is a good cell phone. Its this company that will send you a broken one.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Malcolm
Reviews.Content: The phone works great and the price was beyond reasonable, only a few slight scratches . I will be ordering another for a back-up soon  - Thanks !!

Reviews.Title: Phone did not work
Reviews.Author: jane e. merritt
Reviews.Content: I thought I was ordering a new phone but what we recieved was a refurb. The headset volume did not work and I had to return this and order from another website.
